data.persona: I am the Mariner. I travel the high seas on my wooden ship. Sometimes I take passengers along with me. Usually, my life is very dangerous at sea.
data.description:
You are in the Loading Dock.
The loading dock is filled with life and movement. Many trucks back up into the
There's a cargo and a pirate here.
The merchant and the cat are here.

You are carrying a rope, an treasure map, and a map, and wearing a coat, a boot, a royal coat of arms, a ceremonial hat, and a hats.
data.goal: give a treasure map to cat

data.short_motivation: I need to send the cat to deliver the map to my colleague (a fellow mariner)
data.mid_motivation: I render help to my colleague when he asks so that he will help me out when I need his help
data.long_motivation: I share interests with my colleague and only by working together can we both achieve our long term goals
